title: Lesson 1: Intro
text: Hi! I'm Leo and I'm nine years old. My day is busy! I wake up at 7 o'clock. First, I brush my teeth and get dressed. Then, I eat breakfast – usually cereal! I go to school at 8:30. I love learning! After school, I do my homework. Sometimes I play football with my friends in the park. In the evening, I have dinner with my family. After dinner, I read a book or watch TV. Finally, I go to bed at 9 o'clock. It's a good day!

text.title: Lesson 3: Travel
text.text: Hi! I'm Leo and I love animals! I have a golden retriever called Buddy. He's so fluffy and loves to play fetch. Buddy is my best pet ever! I also really like wild animals. My favourite is the lion – they're so strong! At the zoo, I saw monkeys swinging and elephants splashing. They were amazing! I want to be a vet when I grow up so I can help all animals, big and small. I read lots of books about animals and learn new things every day. Animals are the best!
